Parameter.description: Flag to turn static images on and off
Parameter.name: useStaticImages

Parameter.description: The Base URL for the static subgraph-mapped images
Parameter.name: staticSubgraphImageBaseURL

Parameter.description: The Base URL for the static reaction center images
Parameter.name: staticReactionCenterImageBaseURL

Parameter.description: The Base URL for the small static subgraph-mapped images
Parameter.name: staticSubgraphImageSmallBaseURL

Parameter.description: The Base URL for the small static reaction center images
Parameter.name: staticReactionCenterImageSmallBaseURL

Parameter.description: The base path for session-specific directories
Parameter.name: scratchPath

Parameter.description: Flag for setting up in a test environment
Parameter.name: useRootAsScratch
